basics.name: Emily Zhao
basics.summary: I'm excited by executing cool ideas for a better tomorrow.

education.area: Electrical and Computer Engineering, Computer Science

work.name: Athena AI Institute, NSF REU
highlights: NIH milestone project: developing a RL based hierarchical controller for adaptive DBS
Under the guidance of Visrut Sudhakar and Dr. Miroslav Pajic

work.name: Cardiac Rhythm Management, Medtronic
highlights: Python-based universal core Longevity Estimator algorithm for next-gen implantable cardiac devices to reduce development time by 12 months and standardize cross-device performance
Troubleshot automated testing scripts to improve hardware characterization processes with IC Design and Firmware

work.name: Cardiac Rhythm Management, Medtronic
highlights: Bluetooth field testing and data analysis method to identify interference patterns in operating rooms

work.name: Summer Orchestra Program, Mounds View Public Schools
highlights: Led private lessons, sectionals, and group lessons for 4th-6th grade students learning violin, viola, cello, and bass

Coordinate a STEM hackathon for 100+ high school students, teaching Python & AI, data visualization, game development, and cybersecurity workshops, while connecting participants with professionals on careers in tech.
Lead the redesign and strategic expansion of Duke Conversations, advancing our mission to connect faculty and students through weekly intimate dinner discussions with administration and professors.

awards.title: Cyber 9/12 Strategy Challenge National Champion
awards.summary: 1st of 24 teams from across the country, including West Point Military Academy, Stanford, Air Command and Staff College, etc.
